subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Knicks erased an 11-point deficit in the second quarter and a 13-point deficit in the fourth, which was capped by a game-clinching 3-pointer from Stephon Marbury.
snippet: The Knicks erased an 11-point deficit in the second quarter and a 13-point deficit in the fourth, which was capped by a game-clinching 3-pointer from Stephon Marbury.
